short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the draw and resign buttons on Chess.com DAILY games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of accidentally resigning your Chess.com Daily games while clicking through move history? This extension hides the draw and resign buttons for Daily games.

Never give up. Never surrender.
